name: Chop it!
description:
NOTIFICATION:

  • This game is for Android. Minimum Android 5.0.
  • Please let me know if the game is not working properly for you.

PLAYABLE ITEMS:

Become a wood tycoon, collect and sell trees, manage your sawmill and upgrade your vehicles!

CONTROL:

Tap the screen to display the joystick

FOLOWING

Thanks so much for playing this Chop it!

INFORMATION:

  • Version 1.0
